title: What makes you want to buy a song? - Quora

response.answer_text: If it catches my attention the first time I hear it, and it makes me hear the rest of the songs, or more of that artist’s music. If I know I’ll want to listen to it more than once. If it is a song I have been looking for for ages, and finally found. If it is by an artist I already know and like. And, no matter what, I have to like the melody.

If it makes me want to sing along. My tastes are eclectic, but pale in comparison to my wife’s love of music. (She is a woman that managed to convince me to be lead singer in not one, but two punk bands - one of them steampunk.)
